summary: Matt, the son of a prominent witch family, is expected by the Witches Council, to marry his good friend Lizzy. But when Matt meets Sara, a psychiatrist, his magic fails him and Sara discovers that she suddenly has gained magical powers.
cast: Nikki Deloach|Ryan McPartlin|Harley Jane Kozak|Briana Lane|Jonathan Patrick Moore|Azie Tesfai|Jenny O'Hara|Carolyn Hennesy|Jeff Doucette|Amanda Carlin|Alex Hyde-White|Damien Bodie|Steve Marvel|Darnell Rhea|Darrell Keith Harris|Logan Hunt
title: Un hechizo de amor
